name: soft-boiled
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
